Title: Tad: The Explorer
Writer: Javier López Barreira (screenplay), Gorka Magallón (screenplay), Ignacio del Moral (screenplay), Jordi Gasull (screenplay), Neil Landau (screenplay), Javier López Barreira (comic "Tadeo Jones y el secreto de Toactlum"), Gorka Magallón (comic "Tadeo Jones y el secreto de Toactlum"), Diego San José (additional dialogue), Verónica Fernández (additional writing), Lillian González (story editor)
Actors: Óscar Barberán, Michelle Jenner, José Mota, José Corbacho
Plot: Tad is a celebrity archeologist and adventurer just like his hero Max Mordon... in his dreams! In reality, Tad is a Chicago construction worker. One day, however, he is mistaken for a real ...
